response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our unique product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only meets but exceeds your expectations based on its value to you. We believe it's worth more than $8,000, considering its craftsmanship and potential benefits. To ensure we both achieve a fair deal, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $9,500. This price reflects a generous discount compared to its actual value while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to your response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 9500}
